column4: Does anyone know of a preference for gnome-panel that allows a panel applet to take up that last pixel at the right?  It just seems weird that the right corner pixel is a dead spot.

put the deskbar _button_ or the login / logout applet on the far right of the panel.  Then swing your mouse to that corner.  It seems to me that you should automatically activate the button when you click, but you don't.  Just 1 pixel to the left, and it works though.
